PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Suggested Merc: Winter Deacon Desirable Skills: - Frost Shield [bonus damage reduction] - Vaal Glacial Hammer [glacial cage][ - Ice Crash [fast use for proccing siphoning charges, large AoE for on-hit curses] - Hatred [bonus damage] - Purity of Ice (low priority)
Merc Equipment: Mandatory: - Hale Negator with an abyss jewel socketed - Disintegrator Optional: - Anathema (curse limit) - The Highwayman (clear charges from bosses that they get from Supreme Grandstanding) - Kaom's Binding (phys defenses) - Asenath's Gentle Touch w/ curse on hit corruption (bonus clearspeed) Even more optional: - Garb of the Ephemeral (minimum action speed, crit reduction, giga AoE for merc) - Shaper's Seed for life regen or Xoph's Heart for covered in ash - whatever boots
Don't skimp on abyss jewels. Priority rolls: - High life - flat phys, flat phys while weilding 2 hander, % damage over time while wielding 2 hander - resists, stats as needed
Rings are only rares, just get needed attributes and resists. You WILL want unset rings; you are giga jewel starved with golems + Shroud. Buy life + attribute / resist rings with 2 open prefixes, craft % mana cost, then elder exalted orb. You don't care about third prefix but need elder influence for Blasphemers / Disintegrator.
Amulet corruption is NOT required, but it frees up a gem slot for convocation (helps keep up golems)
Good watcher's eye is not needed, just get Malevolence ailments deal damage faster.
You can swap Purity of Elements for Determination IF YOU WANT TO SPEND MORE and the build will feel a lot better.

Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
%%%% MERC BUFFS % belt Nearby enemies convert 25% of their physical damage to fire
%% rings Curse enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit You can apply an additional curse
%% Hatred aura Gain 59% of physical damage as extra cold damage
